document_data.caption: [[Ketheric Thorm]]'s netherstone.
document_data.name: Netherstone
document_data.creator: [[Karsus]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Netherstones''' were three magical [[artifact]]s associated with the [[Crown of Karsus]].
document_data.Powers: They could be wielded to exert control over the Crown and anyone who wore it.
document_data.History:
They were separated from the Crown during the events of [[Karsus' Folly]] in the {{YearlinkName|-339}}.

In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, they were used by the [[Chosen]] of the [[Dead Three]], who had empowered and enslaved an [[The Absolute|elder brain]] using the Crown.
